ch.ethz.vizzly.cache

Class CacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.ethz.vizzly.cache.CacheManager

  • public class CacheManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the actual caching strategy. Currently each configured cache contains data of a certain temporal resolution.
    Author:
    Matthias Keller
